tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    trend_analysis VARCHAR(255),
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE cities (
    city_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timezone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    precipitation FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES cities(city_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
    forecast_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    forecast_text VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES cities(city_id)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_patterns (
    pattern_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    average_temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    average_humidity FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE climate_trends (
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trend_description TEXT
);
